      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Parameters:
        args - The arguments given when running the program. The 1st argument specifies the torrent file to read. The 2nd specifies the file to save to.

      • getTorrentInfo

        public static GivenTools.TorrentInfo getTorrentInfo(byte[] torrentByteArray)
        Parameters:
        torrentByteArray - A byte array of the torrent file. Gets scanned by the TorrentInfo class.
        Returns:
        TorrentInfo class object made from the torrentByteArray passed int.

      • byteArrayToURLString

        public static java.lang.String byteArrayToURLString(byte[] in)
        Parameters:
        in - Byte array of the infohash to convert to a URL safe string.
        Returns:
        A URL safe string made from the bytes of the infohash

      • close

        public static void close()

      • captureText

        public static java.lang.String captureText(java.lang.Object o)
        Parameters:
        o - Object with print statements to capture from console. Used to get peer data from ToolKit print statements.
        Returns:
        A string of captured text intercepted from console.

      • getURLString

        Parameters:

        Returns:
